mapper.insert: insert into b_application_form (id, application_form_number, applicant_name, applicant_id, applicant_country, issue_date, total_amount, customs_confirm_amount) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applicationFormNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customsConfirmAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
